OK. I've got a small issue that's driving me mad. It popped up suddenly in my ongoing savegame a few days ago, and it also happens in the new savegame I created in a clean install of KSP this morning. The only mods installed in the new, clean install are the cbbp_Dragon and MechJeb2.1 (latest dev version).

I've got a ship that's all stock except for the Dragon command pod created for duplication, but it seems to happen with *any* ship using the Dragon capsule.

The problem is that the Dragon capsule and mechjeb no longer perform the deceleration burn - it just slams into the ground at 110m/s or so each time. Previously mechjeb would put the capsule more or less on the money each time. It also seems to have a hard time using the Dragon engines to fine tune the landing site - it spends a lot of time wagging back and forth over applying corrective thrust.

This only happens with the Dragon capsule - every other ship I use for testing correctly executes the deceleration burn and lands on target.

Is anyone else having this issue? Should I be taking this to the mechjeb thread? Is there a way to upload a craft file here, or do I need a dropbox-esque location to link to?

Thanks in advance.

There are a few bugs I've found with the landing-at-target in MechJeb 2.1 - it went loopy on me while landing on Mun with a lander I tested extensively on Kerbin beforehand. I wasn't using this this mod so I can only assume they messed up something in MechJeb 2.1...

For the sake of testing, try landing the DragonRider pod using the 'Land anywhere option in MechJeb. That one seems to work much more reliably for me.

Unfortunately this doesn't seem to play well with KSP 0.22 and Ferram 0.10. The "center of lift" is above the center of mass so it wants to fly backwards, which emphasizes the Deadly in Deadly Reentry. Also, why is the docking port so tiny compared to the Dragon?

@ Makc

It's a big capsule meant to hold a lot of people, and I'm guessing he wanted it to fit with the regular medium sized docking ports. Rather than it being "proprietary" and only be able to dock with other dragon-capsule-docks.

Though now that we have the larger senior dock, he might adapt it to work with that one.
